fields.description:
If you open an editor, then the macro browser and click on the Anchor macro, the Anchor name has the value "undefined". Also, if you edit the macro with the markup {{{info:icon=false}title=foo is the way to do it{info}}} the macro will open with the Optional title "foo is the way to do it".

This is caused by the bodyParamMap being populated in the macro-browser.js (~line 271) for non-gadget macros. It should probably only run in gadget-specific JS.
fields.summary: Macro Browser parameter fields are populated with "undefined"

Now add a comment, and try to drag and drop.

The image will be opened inside the browser, instead of being uploaded as an attachment.

fields.description:
Add a comment, switch to the RTE, and drag and drop an image to the editor.

The browser returns to the top of the page, and the user must scroll down to continue editing the comment.

This behaviour is annoying.
fields.summary: Drag and Drop of images into comments will cause the browser to scroll to the top of the page

fields.description:
I encountered a strange page permission problem with my own page on QA-EAC:
https://qa-eac.atlassian.com/display/~ggaskell/Testing+page

If someone (other than me) logs in to QA-EAC and visits this page, they'll see that editing restrictions on this page are limited to my account (username=ggaskell).

When I log in to this account (as 'ggaskell'), visit this page and then view the page restrictions dialog box, I see no page restrictions show up. However, I cannot edit this (i.e. my very own) page (very puzzled).

I'm not sure if the following piece of information is significant in this context, but I was recently added to the 'confluence-administrators' group on QA-EAC (for documentation purposes). However, I'm not in this group on EAC.
fields.summary: Strange page permission problem - I can't edit my own page.

fields.description:
Edit a page containing attachments.

Click the 'Insert Link' icon, switch to the Attachments tab, and confirm that the attachments are listed as expected.

Then open the new 'Insert' menu, and click the 'Attachments' item. This opens up the same popup, but now the attachments are not listed.
fields.summary: Insert Link Attachments tab is always empty when opened via the Insert Menu

fields.description:
Our users have fullnames in the format of 'Lastname, Firstname'.  When a search is performed for permissions in the basic search using the same format, it pulls back ALL users in the database ordered by the name field (we use an ID for the name field).

The People Directory in 3.0 appears to function correctly when searching for users utilizing that format.  (2.10.3 doesn't pull back any results)

Advanced search only works properly if the fullname is typed in verbatim (can't type in "first last" to get desired results).

Is there any way to get the search functioning properly for our user base?  Thanks!
fields.summary: Name search for permissions appears to break when name of user is 'last, first" format
Deactivate users via the Remote API

fields.description:
When searching for umlauts, for example: mahngebühren, Confluence can return the search result fine but Confluence live search fail to highlight the search string.

This is because the umlauts search string is coming back broken, as can be seen in the Firebug Response tab in the [screenshot|^Picture 2.png].
fields.summary: Quick Live search fail to highlight search string when there is umlauts

fields.description:
An Example:

Confluence is integrated with LDAP and the LDAP *groups* contained Uppercased characters. Then the customer decided to integrate Confluence and LDAP to Crowd. However, Crowd _Import Process_ lowercased all the group names.

Since the permissions in Confluence are assigned to the Group names, the permissions will be broken. Actually, any data assigned to Group or User names would lose ownerships.
fields.summary: Groups with uppercased characters break permissions for External User/Groups Repositories

fields.description:
There's some weird behaviour going one when you navigate around multiple images with your cursor keys.

It works pretty much as I'd expect except that pressing right cursor key when the 'drop area' is selected doesn't select the first thumbnail.

So for example, if you have the image selected in the screenshot, pressing right twice doesn't work as I'd expect.
fields.summary: Drag-n-drop area in image dialog subtly breaks keyboard navigation

fields.description:
In the RTE, Confluence:

a) should have "Save" and "Cancel" buttons and "Draft saved..." information.
b) should remember if you've set full screen mode (save a cookie) and return you to this mode when editing.
fields.summary: Full Screen Mode - Allow for main actions and save a cookie

fields.summary: Exceptions in performance test logs relating to gadgets
Port old image dialog tests to new dialog

fields.description:
Browse user favourites has regressed in performance on stable, currently with a 95%ile of 20s.

https://bamboo.extranet.atlassian.com/download/CONFSTAB-PERFEXPTOMCAT6PGSQL16/artifacts/build-34/Site-Directory/site/history-fixedloadtest.html

Look for "Browse User Favourites"
fields.summary: Browser User Favourites performance regression

fields.description:
Export page as PDF has slower down several times in stable:

https://bamboo.extranet.atlassian.com/download/CONFSTAB-PERFEXPTOMCAT6PGSQL16/artifacts/build-34/Site-Directory/site/history-fixedloadtest.html

Search down the page for "Export Page as PDF".
fields.summary: Export page as PDF performance regression

fields.description:
These descriptions are supposed to be hidden when none exist. Presumably a regression caused by the gadget integration in the macro browser.

The attachments macro looks particularly bad because most of the parameters have no descriptions.
fields.summary: Macro parameter description i18n keys showing up in Macro Browser

fields.description: We're upgrading the demo space in 3.1.  Ideally we should check that the wiki markup contains no rendering or round-tripping bugs.  There's regression test for round-tripping errors in the existing demo space, so perhaps we should upgrade it or add a new one.  (The test isn't entirely automated, since some of the existing pages fail to round-trip through the RTE perfectly)
fields.summary: Test new demo space

fields.description: In IE6, when you include a page with gadgets, the footer does not get repositioned after the iframe is loaded.
fields.summary: Footer broken in IE6 when using gadgets

fields.description:
Please close this ticket.  It was opened in error.

Thank you and regards,

Kay
fields.summary: Where do I obtain a Client User ID

fields.description:
Hi,
I write a user macro inside a plugin and I want to hidden this macro in Macro browser.

{code}
<user-macro hidden="true" name="....>
<description>....</description>
<template>...</template>
<parameters/>
</user-macro>
{code}

I have specified hidden attribute and <parameters> tag but if I search this macro in macro browser I find it.

Thanks, best regards

Marco Carturan
fields.summary: Macro browser shows user macros defined inside a plugin

fields.description:
Use {calendar} on a page, and it will show as an unknown macro.

Note that it was working previously on QA-EAC with beta1, and the upgrade to beta2 seems to have disabled it.
fields.summary: Calendar Plugin is disabled on QA-EAC

fields.description:
For some reason there's a fixed height on the upload attachments form which results in a scrollable area when you try to upload multiple attachments in IE6. This looks really ugly and is very hard to use.

See attached screenshot.

Simply removing the fixed height doesn't quite work because it causes a layout bug where the footer appears on top of the attachment upload form.
fields.summary: Uploading multiple attachments shows weird scrolling area in IE6

fields.description: In the macro browser, when I select 'tasklist' I can only put in my tasklist title & content. Other parameter such as 'promptOnDelete', 'showAssignee', 'width', 'enableLocking' and 'autoLockOnComplete' are not there for users to choose.
fields.summary: Macro Browser Not Showing Dynamic Tasklist's Parameter

fields.description:
It is a transparent PNG, so we have two options:

- apply the normal transparent PNG filter hack
- change it to be a GIF, since it pretty much always is displayed on a white background.
fields.summary: Drag-n-drop icon doesn't render properly in IE6

fields.description:
As was seen in: https://extranet.atlassian.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1783989426&navigatingVersions=true If you have a section macro that does not include a column macro you end up with table rows with no table cells. Something like: {code} something
{code} This is invalid, and (firefox at least) doesn't like it at all if you place a table within the section macro as well. Usually it doesn't really matter. But now we rely on good markup to place the footer at the bottom of the page, so its more important.
fields.summary: Section macro produces invalid HTML if it does not contain the column macro

fields.description:
We could make the font a bit smaller and remove the background colours when printing.

Jens also suggested making the body a fixed width (800px) during printing, which makes the font size more reasonable.
fields.summary: Improve styles of footer

fields.description:
The drag-n-drop status dialog, when closed, removes the shadow which is behind the insert image dialog when inserting an image in a comment.

See attached screenshots from before, during and after drag-n-drop operation.
fields.summary: Drag-n-drop in comment insert image dialog clears shadow from behind dialog

fields.description:
When I drag an image into the insert image dialog in the comment editor, there are two copies of the same file attached.

Going to the Attachments page shows that there are actually two copies of the same file attached. You can remove them one by one.
fields.summary: Drag-n-drop in comment insert image dialog uploads two copies of the same file

fields.description:
A customer pointed out that the cache configuration setting for multiple ldap repository is out of date: 
- http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Configuring+multiple+LDAP+repositories
- http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF30/Cache+Performance+Tuning

Please change the coherence cache setting to ehcache, just like [the cache performance tuning doc|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Cache+Performance+Tuning].

Cheers,
Roy
fields.summary: Cache documentation for multiple ldap repository is out of date

fields.description: See attached presentation. Fonts are wrong for the first slide.
fields.summary: Wrong font on a particular slide for ppt 2007 preview.

fields.description: It doesn't look like tables are being handled by the ppt 2007 renderer.
fields.summary: Tables aren't showing up in ppt 2007 previews
Excerpt generation misses first character

fields.description:
Some recent changes in AUI will break Confluence unless we stop using AJS.format() for our JS template rendering.

It doesn't make sense to use AJS.format() anyway, because this method is designed to be used for i18n, not for template generation of HTML.
fields.summary: JS template rendering shouldn't use AJS.format()

The WYSIWYG (RTE) editor needs to be revamped to be used and adopted by business users.  This means several things: The RTE should be easy to learn, editing tasks done quickly/efficiently, content can be created and formatted as desired.

fields.description:
Effectively you cannot work on drafts which you wouldn't share with the rest of the world (people who have access to given space). You have to save your page and then edit restrictions.

How to reproduce:
go to your home space, "Add Page", go to Edit restrictions -> this popup does not allow to modify anything (checked on several web browsers) - it's deprived of any controls allowing editing.

Workaround: create empty page, save, edit restrictions and only then continue with fill-out the content. Drawback: people will get notified about your empty page.

In Confluence 3.0.x it worked flawlessly.
fields.summary: Cannot edit restrictions on page creation (before initial page save)

fields.description:
Copying a page on EAC results in a dialog like:

{quote}
Your session has expired. You may need to re-submit the form or reload the page.
{quote}

Steps to reproduce:

# Open the "Info" page for any page
# Select "Copy"
# Change (or don't change) the title
# A warning appears when saving the page and the new page is not created.

This happens regardless of the theme I'm using and regardless of whether the "remember me" tickbox is checked.  It happens reliably on Firefox 3.5 and Safari 4.  The same thing happens if I use the "Copy" option under the tools menu.
fields.summary: Page copy not working in 3.1-beta1-r2

fields.description:
In the blitz test, many users reported errors in the breadcrumb display when using the 'Known Location" tab

We have no good story for reproducing the exact problem but some situations that will break the breadcrumb display are when the space you have selected no longer exists or if the page no longer exists e.g. still in the index but no actually in the DB.

e.g. try these URLS:
https://node2.qa-eac.atlassian.com/pages/breadcrumb.action?spaceKey=CONFDEV&title=Home - will return JSON as expected
https://node2.qa-eac.atlassian.com/pages/breadcrumb.action?spaceKey=CONFDEV&title=Homeyyyy - will return HTML
https://node2.qa-eac.atlassian.com/pages/breadcrumb.action?spaceKey=CONFDEVIANT&title=Home - will return HTML

Trawling the logs for the blitz test show that some of the cases may have been related to the destination spaces have a custom theme configured which was no longer present -
e.g.
{noformat}
2009-11-04 22:53:45,353 WARN [TP-Processor83] [atlassian.confluence.themes.DefaultThemeManager] extractTheme Unable to find configured theme module: com.atlassian.confluence.themes.modern:modern
 -- url: /pages/breadcrumb.action | userName: tcampbell | referer: https://qa-eac.atlassian.com/pages/editpage.action?pageId=1783332921
2009-11-04 22:53:49,083 WARN [TP-Processor16] [atlassian.confluence.themes.DefaultThemeManager] extractTheme Unable to find configured theme module: com.atlassian.confluence.themes.modern:modern
{noformat}

Might be a red herring.

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-17606].
  {panel}

Steps:
1. Edit page restrictions.
2. Add a group.
3. Search for a group that returns multiple pages of results (e.g. "a").
4. Select groups from results page 1.
5. Navigate to results page 2.
6. Return to results page 1.

Behaviour:
Selections have gone.

Expected:
Selections expected to be retained.

fields.description:
From customer report:

{quote}
When editing pages using the rich text editor in IE8, the editor jumps to the top of the document every time the "Draft Saved at ..." notification appears above it.

Whilst this doesn't move the cursor (so you can continue typing and the editor will go back to the right place although in most cases, the user is unlikely to notice this), it is very distracting to the user who's editing the contents.

Turning on or off the IE8 "Compatibility mode" doesn't seem to affect the behaviour.
{quote}

Verified in 3.0.0_01 however not replicable on 3.1-beta1. Looks like it's been resolved as part of [CONF-15413|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-15413]
fields.summary: Editor jumps to top of page when saving draft in IE8

fields.summary: Viewfile macro doesn't work inside the chart macro

fields.description:
It seems the check for duplicates is only performed for the root node of the hierarchy you are moving. Any child nodes which are duplicates aren't actually checked.

This results in two pages within the same space sharing the same title. One of these pages will effectively be "shadowed" under the other and cannot be accessed.

h5. Workaround to get to the "hidden" pages:
* Edit the page that can be seen to use a different title
* The two pages should now have unique titles, therefore can be reference separately
fields.summary: Using move page dialog you can cause duplicate titles in a space
